title: Neon Tasker
description: Offline‑first task app with background sync, optimistic UI, and push notifications.
longDescription: Neon Tasker is a PWA with install support, background sync, and a resilient offline experience. It uses IndexedDB for storage and progressive enhancement for notifications.
lighthouse: Performance 100 • Accessibility 100 • Best Practices 100 • PWA Ready

title: Aether Charts
description: Canvas‑based charting playground with 120 FPS interactions and lazy data loading.
longDescription: Aether Charts showcases high-performance Canvas drawings, dynamic sampling, and input latency under 10ms.

title: Pulse UI Kit
description: Accessible component library built on Web Components with tokens and themes.
longDescription: Pulse UI Kit demonstrates semantic component APIs, focus guards, ARIA correctness, and CSS custom properties for theming.

title: Glide Maps
description: Smooth, GPU‑accelerated map interactions with inertial panning and clustering.
longDescription: Glide Maps uses requestAnimationFrame loops, spatial indexing, and cluster aggregation for silky navigations.

title: Voyager Notes
description: Markdown note editor with live preview, autosave, and export to PDF.
longDescription: Voyager Notes offers a minimal note-taking interface with keyboard shortcuts, instant preview, and client-side PDF export.

title: Nimbus Gallery
description: Responsive image gallery with view transitions and prefetching for near‑instant nav.
longDescription: Nimbus Gallery highlights buttery navigation using the View Transitions API and link prefetching for perceived instant loads.
